name: The Hotel (christie262)
description:
THE HOTEL is a project that will feature a point and click adventure but with an uncompromising adult theme.  The demo I uploaded is an example of what the game play will be like.  It is not a representation of the actual game concept.  The actual game will include time travel and exciting adventure.  The demo is a very bare bones look at the final concept game.

The included files are for PC but executable files can also be created for Mac and Linux.
